Description: Section (two fragments joined) of the upper-body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar (ostracon), the fabric is partially grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393536) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393536)
